items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dress!! I need more!
items.body: The dress arrived and I was absolutely blown away at the style and quality. I tried it on and it fit like a GLOVE!! It is tight but still fits perfectly. It’s snug but perfect. I will be leaving another review with photo after I wear it tonight.! I’m 5’ 124lbs, I ordered a small although a medium would have given me a little more room. Read more
items.author: jennifer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: This dress is gorgeous. The quality and fit are amazing and the touching helps hide any imperfections. Would highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Gabriel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple but pretty
items.body: I needed a dress for a semi formal wedding. I didn’t want it to be too flashy. This dress was perfect. Super comfortable and I thought it looked beautiful. I’m 5’09 about 175 pounds and bought a size large and my dress was black. Read more
items.author: Sissa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved!
items.body: Fits great, true to size! Love the stretchiness. Read more
items.author: Jordan D

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy elegant dress that turns heads
items.body: Love this dress! It was very comfy and flattering. It is tight to the body so I did wear spanx but I got so many compliments on this. I wore it to my husbands work Christmas party. Sexy yet elegant. I am 5’7 190 lbs I got a large. Read more
items.author: Marcus Edmonds

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit to size
items.body: Love this dress! The color is gorgeous and the fit was perfect. Read more
items.author: KMR

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: Love the material and fit. Read more
items.author: Maxi

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs small. Perfect length, largerBust-BEWARE.
items.body: The color of this dress is gorgeous. I typically love mesh overlay style dresses. This runs verySmall. I ordered a size up since rouching is typically more forgiving when it's not stretched to oblivion, and I am sometimes sensitive to turtleneck styles. I wear womens 8-10, 36ddd. I ordered this in xL. The mesh on this dress is of the itchiest I've ever encountered. The sleeves were long but ridiculously tight..I have muscular arms, but have zero problems fitting sleeves in an xL, anything, until this dress arrived.. The sweetheart style neckline is lovely, however my large chest felt suffocated, and wearing it in a manner that the neckline didn't look misplaced, tugged at the more delicate mesh mockNeck rendering a sloppy look..this was both uncomfortable and unsightly on my body. The length was fabulous..I am 5'7", and this falls just below the largest portion of my calves..so flattering..length can somewhat be adjusted if you order this in *your size according to *the sizeChart..you can scrunch the fabric more along the bodice. No slit, which I also loved. Hard pass for me though, due to issues regarding the mesh, misplaced neckline and mockneck on my particular bod. However, I am sure it'll look great on the bodies it is made for! Read more
items.author: MazeMama

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Ruched Evening Long Sleeve Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Ruched Evening Long Sleeve Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Wine Red, Starry Blue, Thyme Green, Chocolate, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
